<BUTTON onclick="modal1.open();" label="Open Modal" />
<!-- Ensure Modals are a direct child of the template and not nested within widgets -->
<MODAL id="modal1" width="300" height="300">
	<BOX pad="10" valign="between">
		<BOX layout="row" height="50" valign="center">
			<ICON icon="warning" size="50" color="orange" />
			<PAD left="25" />
			<TEXT size="36" value="Warning" color="orange" />
		</BOX>
		<BOX layout="row" halign="around">
			<BTN onclick="modal1.close();" label="cancel" />
			<BTN onclick="modal1.close();" label="continue" />
		</BOX>
	</BOX>
</MODAL>
MODAL [FML].description: A warning Modal example snippet and a supplied button to open
